attributes.action: Wrongfully accused I want for accusers who do this to face a penilty
attributes.additional_details:
Bein wrongfully accused of a crime can have stigma attached 
Can have a negitive impact on peoples health 
And by no means is right or ok people are commiting suicide because of this 
It is wrong and the law needs changed 
We need to stand up and do something about this and now before more lives are lost
attributes.background: Put a penilty in place for folk that do this

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already a criminal offence to lie to the police, waste police time or lie under oath. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
